column4: Whenever I insert a certain usb flash drive, ubuntu doesn't recognize it. Please help me!
Can you see it in lsusb?
User blkid to find the uuid or device identifier for it, then mount it manually. let me know if you need help to do it
how do I mount it manually
do you have anything else to tell me?
dunno ... did you mount it ok? get stuck with the command to mount it ...?
I got stuck with the command to mount it.
ok, could you paste the output of blkid to p.defau.lt for me?
I type blkid and it comes out with nothing
